column1: Little Goat Diner////I will say that despite the fact that the menu mentioned the French toast having egg
column2: I completely forgot about it by the time we received it. Come to find out
column3: it was inside the toast. So good and complemented the sweetness of the toast and syrup so well. Having said that
column4: I think if I had to choose the Okonomiyaki was my favorite.
